totp.name: Timed password (TOTP)
totp.howTo: Push 'Generate QrCode ', then scan the code using your Esup Auth app or Google Authenticator app or enter the code directly into your TOTP application

random_code.description: Method to generate random codes valid for some time

random_code_mail.description: Method to generate random codes and sent it by mail

bypass.name: Backup codes
bypass.description: Method for generating a random codes list

matrix.name: Authentication Grid
matrix.description: Method to connect via a grid

push.name: Notification (Esup Auth)
push.description: Method for connecting via smartphone notifications with Esup Auth
push.push_confirmation1: Please scan this code in the smartphone application
push.push_confirmation2: If your smartphone does not have a functional picture appreil or you are having difficulties to scan the code above. Go to the menu "Settings " then click "Activate without scan ".

webauthn.usage: If you have a physical device such as a Yubikey, you should plug it in now.
webauthn.no_authentificators: You have no authentificators registered. Register one ?

home.description: ESUP-OTP permits you to add a second level of protection to your account. You can, for example, set a single-use code sent to you by SMS in addition to your username and password. Thus, a third can not access your account with the same password.
home.totp: TOTP code into an application (Esup Auth, Authenticator...).
home.esupnfc: Connection with student card or business card
home.note: Set up at least 2 methods among:

action.confirm_generate: Old codes will be erased. Continue ?

webauthn.confirm_delete: You won't be able to log in with this authentificator anymore. Continue ?
webauthn.give_name_to_factor: Please enter a name for your factor. Press %CANCEL_KEY% to cancel.
